pages.text:
Greetings,
​
Bruline Bikar-Lindquist is the visionary founder of Golden Pineapple, a business she launched in 2007 with a passion for holistic living. Initially offering herbal teas, organic products, social events, and wine tastings, Golden Pineapple Club LLC has since evolved under her leadership into a distinctive hybrid concept that seamlessly blends boutique event management with co-working and lifestyle experiences.
Bruline’s professional background spans hospitality and hotel management, sales and marketing, and event planning. She is actively involved in civic organizations and dedicates her time to community development, reflecting her belief in giving back and fostering meaningful connections. A creative soul, she finds inspiration in gardening adventures and crafting unique experiences that bring people together.
A native of the Caribbean, Bruline possesses a deep appreciation for nature and is committed to living a life of purpose and quality. She embodies the American dream while remaining closely tied to her roots, frequently traveling to her beloved islands of St. Croix and St. Lucia to reset, retreat, and realign. As an eco-travel enthusiast, she embraces new cultures and loves participating in festivals and carnivals.
On most days, you’ll find Bruline enjoying a cup of herbal tea while tending to her garden or exploring local thrift shops and charming boutiques across Florida, satisfying her love of discovery and creativity.
Known for her strong work ethic, reliability, and innovative spirit, Bruline is dedicated to delivering professional, high-quality services that exceed expectations. Golden Pineapple is more than a brand—it is an authentic expression of her values, passions, and commitment to excellence.
She warmly invites you to grow with her and experience the unique blend of inspiration, community, and quality that defines Golden Pineapple Club LLC.
Thank you for taking the time to learn more about Bruline Bikar-Lindquist.
​
Bruline Bikar-Lindquist
Manager

Bruline Bikar-Lindquist
Manager
P. O. Box 6876
Avon Park, FL 33826
Tel: 863-624-9752
goldenpineappleclub@gmail.com
© 2025 by The Golden Pineapple LLC
.
​

Other Services
Weddings
WEDDINGS
Your wedding is a celebration of love, unity, and the beginning of a beautiful adventure with all your favorite people there to cheer on your “happily ever after.”
Golden Pineapple Club Event Management is built on the belief that thoughtful planning and seamless coordination are key to a truly memorable event. Our team is dedicated to delivering professional, attentive service to bring your unique vision to life.
From engagement parties and bridal showers to bachelor/bachelorette gatherings, rehearsal dinners, and next-day Afterglow brunches, our customizable wedding packages are designed to celebrate your love, laughter, and joy every step of the way.
A dedicated Golden Pineapple Club representative will be on-site to manage coordination and resolve any issues, ensuring your day unfolds smoothly and stress-free.
​
The Engagement
This package is designed for managing the Engagement.
​
We visit the venue of your choice and confirm that the requirements you expect will meet your expectation.
​
We coordinate and monitor the activities and oversee the execution of the event to its entirety.
We are dedicated to providing professional, attentive and coordination to manage your Engagement.
Request a Booking
The Rehersal
This package is designed for the Wedding Rehearsal Event.
​
It’s the day before the big day and it’s time for the rehearsal.
​
​
​
We are dedicated to providing professional, attentive and coordination to manage your Rehearsal.
Request a Booking
The After Glow
This package is designed for the day After Wedding Event.
It’s the day after the big day and it’s time for the wrap up.
​
​
We are dedicated to providing professional, attentive and coordination to manage your After Glow Event.
​
Request a Booking
Private Parties
SPECIAL EVENTS
It's time to celebrate your special occasion with professional assistance; you can celebrate accomplishments and milestones with the close family and friends. From Anniversary Celebrations, Birthday Parties and Baby Showers, your happiness is our success.
Golden Pineapple Club Event Management Service was built on the principle that a well-planned and organized event will guarantee the overall success of the event.
A Golden Pineapple Club representative will be present at the event to assist in
resolving any situations and handle any on-site coordination.
The Anniversary
We are dedicated to providing professional, attentive and coordination to manage your Anniversary Party.
Request a Booking
The Birthday
We are dedicated to providing professional, attentive and coordination to manage your Birthday Event.
Request a Booking
The Baby Shower

Golden Pineapple Club Membership
Professional Networking,
Co-Working
&
Social Events
​
Join the Golden Pineapple Club and unlock exclusive membership benefits, including access to sustainable events, opportunities to launch your product line, and VIP entry to our Co-Working Hub.
Golden Pineapple Club offers tailored solutions for entrepreneurs, creators, and small business owners, featuring private offices and flexible options to support your growth.
Enjoy weekly, monthly, and yearly events held both onsite and at various inspiring locations.
Our GPC Marketplace and Business Center provide business solutions and offer booth spaces inside and outside our storefront, creating opportunities for visibility and connection.
Additional events and experiences include fishing, camping and glamping, biking excursions, Plant & Pour workshops, flora and fauna festivals, the Caribbean Country Club, Stone Soup gatherings, Soda & Sundae socials, movie nights with popcorn, mix and mingle events, Culture Carnival, island excursions, and much more.
Come grow, connect, and thrive with us at Golden Pineapple Club!
​
​
​
​
​
Let's Schedule A Tour
